i1.name: Hemorrhage
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Damaging [[basic attack]]s [[on-attack]] and [[Champion ability|abilities]] cause the target to bleed every {{fd|1.25}} seconds for 5 seconds, dealing {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|13 to 30}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 30% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} over the duration. This can stack up to 5 times for a maximum of {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|13*5 to 30*5}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 150% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|physical damage}} over the duration. The '''total''' damage is increased by 75% against {{tip|monsters}}.
Upon applying full ''Hemorrhage'' stacks to an enemy {{tip|champion}} or killing one with {{ai|Noxian Guillotine|Darius}}, '''Darius''' gains ''Noxian Might'' for 5 seconds.

{{sbc|Noxian Might:}} '''Darius''' gains {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|18|30|35|40|45|50|55|60|65|70|75|85|95|105|130|155|180|205|230|formula=30+5 per level, then+10 per level from lvl 11, then+25 per level from lvl 14}}|attack damage}} {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}}} and instantly applies full ''Hemorrhage'' stacks through his usual means.
i1.notes:
* ''Hemorrhage'' will grant {{tip|sight|vision}} of champions it is going to kill.
* ''Hemorrhage'' does not apply to [[structures]] nor {{tip|wards}}.
* '''Darius'''' attacks and abilities have to deal damage to apply ''Hemorrhage''.
** ''Hemorrhage'' cannot be applied to/refreshed against {{tip|invulnerable}} targets.
** ''Hemorrhage'' '''can''' be applied to and refreshed against {{tip|shield|shielded}} targets.

q1.name: Decimate
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Darius''' hefts his axe for {{fd|0.75}} seconds, and then swings it around himself, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to nearby enemies, reduced to 35% against enemies hit by the ''handle''.

Against champions and large monsters, '''Darius''' {{tip|heal|heals}} for {{as|{{sti|health|{{passive progression/deprecated version|changedisplay=true|type=enemies hit by the ''blade''|3|key=%|15 to 45|1;2;3+|formula=15%*Enemies hit. ''This is capped at 3 enemies.''}} of his '''missing''' health}}}}. The ''handle'' of '''Darius' ''' axe will not apply {{ai|Hemorrhage|Darius}} nor heal him.
'''Darius''' is unable to declare basic attacks and cast {{ai|Apprehend|Darius}} or {{ai|Noxian Guillotine|Darius}} during ''Decimate''.

w1.name: Crippling Strike
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Darius' ''' next [[basic attack]] within 4 seconds becomes {{tip|unstoppable basic attack|unstoppable}}, gains {{sti|range|25 '''bonus''' range}}, deals {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and {{tip|slow|slows}} the target by 90% for 1 second.
If ''Crippling Strike'' [[kill]]s the target, it refunds its {{as|{{sti|mana|mana cost}}}} and half of its {{sti|cooldown}}.
''Crippling Strike'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Darius' ''' basic attack timer, and is affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers.
''The attack's animation can be cancelled by casting {{ai|Decimate|Darius}}, but the attack will still land.''
w1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the entire attack (including the '''base''' attack damage).
* ''Crippling Strike'' will trigger {{ri|Manaflow Band}}.
* Despite its name, ''Crippling Strike'' does not {{tip|cripple}} anymore.

e1.name: Apprehend
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Darius''' {{tip|airborne|pulls in}} all enemies in front of him, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 40% for 1 second, and briefly gains {{tip|sight}} of the area around the pull.
e1.notes:
* After the pull, '''Darius''' will attempt to basic attack the closest pulled target.
* The armor penetration {{tip|stacks multiplicatively}} with other forms of [[Armor_penetration#Percentage_armor_penetration|percentage armor penetration]].

r1.name: Noxian Guillotine
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Darius''' attempts to execute the target enemy {{tip|champion}}, {{tip|lunge|leaping}} towards them to deal {{tip|true damage|{{as|true damage}}}}, increased by {{pp|type=[[File:Hemorrhage.png|20px]] Hemorrhage stacks|key=%|0 to 100 by 20|0 to 5}}.

If the target dies within {{fd|0.15}} seconds after being hit by ''Noxian Guillotine'', '''Darius''' causes all nearby {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}} to {{tip|flee}} for 3 seconds during which they are rapidly {{tip|slow|slowed}} by up to 99% over the duration, and is able to recast the ability within 20 seconds at no cost.
At rank 3, ''Noxian Guillotine'' has no {{sti|{{as|mana cost}}}} and instead completely resets its {{sti|cooldown}} if it kills its target.
r1.notes:
* The ability does not go on {{sti|cooldown}} nor consume {{tip|mana}} if it's interrupted during the cast. This may only happen if:
** '''Darius''' or his target {{tip|death|dies}} during the leap.
** '''Darius''' loses {{tip|sight}} of his target.
** The target becomes {{tip|untargetable}}.
* ''Noxian Guillotine's'' cooldown after the recast or recast window is calculated by taking the values at the end, and using this formula: (''Noxian Guillotine's'' Cooldown - time since first cast){{times}}(1 - {{sti|cdr}}).
* ''Noxian Guillotine'' applies {{ai|Hemorrhage|Darius}} after the damage.
* '''Darius''' will only leap towards the target if it is at range, or leap backwards if it is very close.
** This leap can pass very thin terrain and will otherwise not be able to. In any case, '''Darius''' will still hit the target.
** The ability is disabled while {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}} even if '''Darius''' is in the range in which he does not leap.
* ''Noxian Guillotine'' will not reset nor trigger {{ai|Hemorrhage 2|Darius|Noxian Might}} if used to kill a {{tip|clone}} or a target protected by {{tip|resurrection}}.
* ''Noxian Guillotine'' will reset but not trigger {{ai|Hemorrhage 2|Darius|Noxian Might}} if it finishes off a target that is in a {{tip|zombie state}}.
